allocated-storage.Description: The new storage capacity of the RDS instance.  Changing this does not result in outage.

db-instance-class.Description: Indicates compute and memory capacity for DB instance. Changing this does result in outage.

db-security-groups.Description: Indicates the list of DB security groups to authorize on this DB instance. Changing this does result in outage.  Valid values: db.t1.micro | db.m1.small | db.m1.medium | db.m1.large | db.m1.xlarge | db.m2.xlarge | db.m2.2xlarge | db.m2.4xlarge | db.m3.medium | db.m3.large | db.m3.xlarge | db.m3.2xlarge | db.r3.large | db.r3.xlarge | db.r3.2xlarge | db.r3.4xlarge | db.r3.8xlarge
